bibl.title: The Plot of Q. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Addresses two questions: (1) Is Q a narrative? [or just a collection of sayings and speeches of Jesus?], and (2) Is Q a narrative gospel? Both questions receive an affirmative answer.
bibl.seg: Fleddermann Harry T., The Plot of Q. Avec résumé en anglais.
Addresses two questions: (1) Is Q a narrative? [or just a collection of sayings and speeches of Jesus?], and (2) Is Q a narrative gospel? Both questions receive an affirmative answer.
